name: Isaac Zakariah
message: We chose the Dubai tour package from Goyaka for our last vacation. The tour was amazing, especially the desert safari. Our driver was helpful and a good guide in explaining us everything about the countryâ€™s tradition, culture, cuisines, etc. We are happy that we chose Goyaka.
